Package model

Class SoccerGame

java.lang.Object
model.SoccerGame
public class SoccerGame
extends java.lang.Object
This class is to create and control a game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SoccerGame()
    Create soccer game object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void automateGoalkeeper() Move goalkeeper based on position of the ball. If the ball is on side of goalkeeper, goalkeeper grabs and shoots it. Otherwise, goalkeeper moves randomly.
    GamePlayer getActivePlayer() To get active player(striker).
    PlayerCollection getGamePlayers() To get game players
    java.lang.Integer getGoal()
    To get goal score
    java.lang.Integer getTimeRemaining()
    To get remaining time
    java.lang.Boolean isOver() Check if the game is over
    java.lang.Boolean isPaused() Check if the game is paused
    boolean isScored() Check if the goal was scored
    void setGoal​(java.lang.Integer newGoal) To set goal score
    void setOver​(java.lang.Boolean over) To set whether the game is over
    void setPaused​(java.lang.Boolean paused) To set whether the game is paused
    void setTimeRemaining​(java.lang.Integer timeRemaining)
    To set remaining time

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • automateGoalkeeper

      public void automateGoalkeeper()
      Move goalkeeper based on position of the ball. If the ball is on side of goalkeeper, goalkeeper grabs and shoots it. Otherwise, goalkeeper moves randomly.
